posts.post_content:
I have been asking around, and this is the worst card anyone has been able to come up with. Two criteria: 1) It must not be in any winning combo.  
2) It is so bad, that if you had it in play, you would try to get rid of it.  
  
This is the current winner.  
  
Mudhole is worthless, like Sorrow's Path. But, they are not liabilities. This card actually screws you over.
posts.html:
I have been asking around, and this is the worst card anyone has been able to come up with. Two criteria: 1) It must not be in any winning combo.
2) It is so bad, that if you had it in play, you would try to get rid of it.

This is the current winner.

Mudhole is worthless, like Sorrow's Path. But, they are not liabilities. This card actually screws you over.

posts.post_content:
Hey, Leshrac\_Nightwalker, you could go whole hog and imprint a [Soul Foundry](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Soul Foundry) with alabaster leech so you could generate one every turn and then us Bazaar Trader every turn to give ti to your opponent. With the Painter's Servant combo you're making all of his spells cost 1 more the first turn you do this, 2 more on the second, 3 more on the third, 4 more on the fourth...  
  
and it's not 4 generic, it's 4 white.  
  
Mind you, it's a relatively unlikely 4 card combo consisting of this creature, an artifact, and artifact creature, and a red creature.

posts.post_content:
Invasion was such an awesome and flavourful set. We had the Primeval Dragon cycle, great legends like [Reya Dawnbringer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reya Dawnbringer) not to mention some Weatherlight crew members FINALLY getting cards like [Hanna, Ship's Navigator](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Hanna, Ship's Navigator), [Captain Sisay](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Captain Sisay).  
  
I don't think it would be possible to imagine the disappointment in opening up an Invasion booster and getting this junk as the rare card.
posts.html:
Invasion was such an awesome and flavourful set. We had the Primeval Dragon cycle, great legends like Reya Dawnbringer not to mention some Weatherlight crew members FINALLY getting cards like Hanna, Ship's Navigator, Captain Sisay.

I don't think it would be possible to imagine the disappointment in opening up an Invasion booster and getting this junk as the rare card.
